Package moteur

Class Stack

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Stack
  • public class Stack
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Stack is an agregation of crads, more specifically, is made up of CardsAJouer. Stack is a pile of cards different from the DrawDeck and each player's Offer or Jest. In later rounds(not the first round of the game), first, collect up the cards not taken from the playersâ€™ Offer in the previous round (each player will have 1 card remaining in front of them) and place these cards in a face-down Stack. Then add to the stack a number of cards from the draw deck equal to the number of players. Shuffle this stack and deal 2 cards to each player.

    This class has 4 methodes, which ensure the basic operations. With a linked list named cards, the elements are of type of CardsAJouer, which correspondes the real situation. The methodes of class can get the number of rest cards, can get the whole ensemble of the stack. Also, most importantly, with shuffle(), the cards in the stack will be shuffled, userful at the very begining of the game.
